text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo And with no social distancing, no masks as COVID-19 makes it’s way through the White House 🤦🏽‍♂️

Hey everyone, let’s decapitate the US military in one meeting! ...wow are these people STUPID!
